thread.section_title: YesStyle.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of YesStyle.com | www.yesstyle.com | 7 of 620
thread.title: Maricar Dela Cruz
thread.title_full: YesStyle.com reviewed by Maricar Dela Cruz

author: Maricar Dela Cruz
title: Maricar Dela Cruz
text: Everything on the website is really cute! From my last order, I expected shipping to Hawaii to be really slow, however if you manage to choose items that will ship within 24 hours, delivery comes within 2 weeks. That's a lot faster than most sites. Though some clothes are not going to be exactly how you expect them to be as shown in pictures, materials received are still as satisfying. So I can't wait for my next shipment to come in.
